name: Explosive Salvation
description:
The Zombies caught the world off guard...

Some people saw it coming. Steve was not one of them.

After years of dreaming of his chance to show off the skills he had honed in hours of Zombie Survival games, Steve's demise was early, slow, and visceral.
Still wanting to be a hero, the now ghostly Spooky Steve coordinated the rescue effort and set to work scaring Civilians for their own salvation
